mapper.select: SELECT user_no AS userNo, record_no AS recordNo, title, author, start_date AS startDate, finish_date AS endDate, input_date AS inputDate, status, memo FROM record WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
SELECT user_no AS userNo, record_no AS recordNo, title, author, start_date AS startDate, finish_date AS endDate, input_date AS inputDate, status, memo FROM record WHERE record_no = #{recordNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO record ( user_no, title, author, start_date, finish_date, input_date, status, memo ) VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{title}, #{author}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{inputDate}, #{status}, #{memo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE record SET title = #{title}, author = #{author}, start_date = #{startDate}, finish_date = #{endDate}, input_date = #{inputDate}, status = #{status}, memo = #{memo} WHERE record_no = #{recordNo}
